languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} gains a special tactical advantage effect that allows them to empower their attacks. They gain +1 stack of this effect for every 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained by themselves or their allies.
The Master Tactician begins combat with a number of tactical advantage stacks equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Мастер-тактик{/g} может накапливать тактическое преимущество — особый эффект, позволяющий усиливать атаки. Он получает 1 уровень этого эффекта за каждые 5 единиц {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}, получаемых самим мастером-тактиком или его союзниками.
В начале боя число уровней тактического преимущества равно <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}ОБЩ{/g} мастера-тактика</u>.

traits.locale_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} gains a special tactical advantage effect that allows them to empower their attacks. They gain +1 stack of this effect for every 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained by themselves or their allies.
The Master Tactician begins combat with a number of tactical advantage stacks equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>.

Tactician gains 1 stack of Tactical Advantage per every 5 Momentum gained by Tactician or their allies. The Tactitian begins combat with the amount of Tactical Advantage stacks equal to their Fellowship Bonus.

The Tactician gains 1 stack of Tactical Advantage per every 5 momentum gained by the Tactician or their allies. The Tactician begins combat with the amount of Tactical Advantage stacks equal to their Fellowship bonus.

The Tactician gains 1 stack of Tactical Advantage per every 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g} gained by the Tactician or their allies. The Tactician begins combat with the amount of Tactical Advantage stacks equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} gains +1 stack of tactical advantage per every 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained by the Master Tactician or their allies.
The Master Tactician begins combat with a number of tactical advantage stacks equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} gains a special tactical advantage effect that allows them to empower their attacks. They gain +1 stack of this effect per every 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained by themselves or their allies.
The Master Tactician begins combat with a number of tactical advantage stacks equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} gains a special tactical advantage effect that allows them to empower their attacks. They gain +1 stack of this effect for every 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained by themselves or their allies.
The Master Tactician begins combat with a number of tactical advantage stacks equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>.

В начале боя число уровней тактического преимущества равно <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}ОБЩ{/g} мастера-тактика</u>.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Мастер-тактик{/g} может накапливать тактическое преимущество — особый эффект, позволяющий усиливать атаки. Он получает 1 уровень этого эффекта за каждые 5 единиц {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}, получаемых самим мастером-тактиком или его союзниками.
В начале боя число уровней тактического преимущества равно <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}ОБЩ{/g} мастера-тактика</u>.

Тактик получает 1 уровень Тактического преимущества за каждые 5 единиц моментума, получаемых самим тактиком или его союзниками. В начале боя число уровней Тактического преимущества тактика равно {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ОБЩ тактика.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}获得特殊的战术优势，可以强化自身攻击。战术专家或其盟友每获得5点{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，战术专家就会获得1层战术优势。
战术专家在战斗开始获得额外战术优势层数，等同于战术专家的<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} gains a special tactical advantage effect that allows them to empower their attacks. They gain +1 stack of this effect for every 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained by themselves or their allies.
The Master Tactician begins combat with a number of tactical advantage stacks equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}获得特殊的战术优势，可以强化自身攻击。战术专家或其盟友每获得5点{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，战术专家就会获得1层战术优势。
战术专家在战斗开始获得额外战术优势层数，等同于战术专家的<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} gana un efecto de Ventaja táctica especial que le permite reforzar sus ataques. Obtiene +1 acumulación de este efecto por cada 5 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} que ganen él mismo o sus aliados.
El maestro táctico empieza el combate con tantas acumulaciones de Ventaja táctica como su <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}</u>.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} gains a special tactical advantage effect that allows them to empower their attacks. They gain +1 stack of this effect for every 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained by themselves or their allies.
The Master Tactician begins combat with a number of tactical advantage stacks equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>.

traits.locale_text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} gana un efecto de Ventaja táctica especial que le permite reforzar sus ataques. Obtiene +1 acumulación de este efecto por cada 5 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} que ganen él mismo o sus aliados.
El maestro táctico empieza el combate con tantas acumulaciones de Ventaja táctica como su <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}</u>.

El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} gana 1 acumulación de Ventaja táctica por cada 5 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} obtenido por el maestro táctico o sus aliados.
El maestro táctico empieza el combate con tantas acumulaciones de Ventaja táctica como su <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}</u>.

languages.text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} erhält einen speziellen taktischen Vorteil, der seine Angriffe verstärkt. Er erhält +1 Stapel dieses Effektes für jeweils 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} die er selbst erworben oder durch Verbündete erhalten hat.
Der Meistertaktiker hat zu Beginn des Kampfes Taktischer-Vorteil-Stapel in Höhe seines <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u>.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} gains a special tactical advantage effect that allows them to empower their attacks. They gain +1 stack of this effect for every 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained by themselves or their allies.
The Master Tactician begins combat with a number of tactical advantage stacks equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>.

traits.locale_text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} erhält einen speziellen taktischen Vorteil, der seine Angriffe verstärkt. Er erhält +1 Stapel dieses Effektes für jeweils 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} die er selbst erworben oder durch Verbündete erhalten hat.
Der Meistertaktiker hat zu Beginn des Kampfes Taktischer-Vorteil-Stapel in Höhe seines <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u>.

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maître tacticien{/g} gagne un effet d'Avantage tactique qui lui permet de renforcer ses attaques. Il gagne 1 cumul d'Avantage tactique par tranche de 5 points de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} que ses alliés ou lui obtiennent.
Le maître tacticien commence le combat avec un nombre de cumuls d'Avantage tactique égal à son <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}SOC{/g}</u>.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} gains a special tactical advantage effect that allows them to empower their attacks. They gain +1 stack of this effect for every 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained by themselves or their allies.
The Master Tactician begins combat with a number of tactical advantage stacks equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>.

traits.locale_text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maître tacticien{/g} gagne un effet d'Avantage tactique qui lui permet de renforcer ses attaques. Il gagne 1 cumul d'Avantage tactique par tranche de 5 points de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} que ses alliés ou lui obtiennent.
Le maître tacticien commence le combat avec un nombre de cumuls d'Avantage tactique égal à son <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}SOC{/g}</u>.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}は、自身または味方が獲得した{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}5につき、戦術的優位を+1特別なスタック得る。
戦術の達人は、その<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>に等しいスタック数の戦術的優位を所持した状態で戦闘を開始する。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} gains a special tactical advantage effect that allows them to empower their attacks. They gain +1 stack of this effect for every 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained by themselves or their allies.
The Master Tactician begins combat with a number of tactical advantage stacks equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}は、自身または味方が獲得した{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}5につき、戦術的優位を+1スタック得る。
戦術の達人は、その<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>に等しいスタック数の戦術的優位を所持した状態で戦闘を開始する。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Usta Taktisyen{/g}, saldırılarını güçlendirmesini sağlayan özel bir taktiksel avantaj etkisi kazanır. Kendisinin veya dost birimlerinin kazandığı her 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentumda{/g} bu etkinin +1 birikimini elde eder.
Usta Taktisyen, çatışmaya <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}SYL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g}</u>na eşit sayıda taktiksel avantaj birikimiyle başlar.

The Master Tactician begins combat with a number of tactical advantage stacks equal to their <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>.

Usta Taktisyen, çatışmaya <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}SYL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g}</u>na eşit sayıda taktiksel avantaj birikimiyle başlar.

Usta Taktisyen, çatışmaya <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}SYL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g}</u>na eşit sayıda taktiksel avantaj birikimiyle başlar.
